## convertToPrioritizedExtension variable

Converts an extension to its mapped value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
convertToPrioritizedExtension: <GExtension extends AnyExtension = any>(extension: FlexibleExtension<GExtension>) => PrioritizedExtension<GExtension>
```
